record.dc:title: 23McL7, 15McL7, McLean, Kentucky. Butterfield Site. Features No. 20, 21, 22, 23.
record.wpa:narrative: This group of pits lie in the trench bounded by the L-51 and L-52 lines. They all originate in the Hab. Lev and penetrate into the yellow sand beneath. In the left foreground is Feature 20. The second and slightly to the right is Feature 21. Beyond this and in line is Feature 22. In the end of the trench is Feature 23. The photograph is taken from the south. In the background is the fringe of timber bordering the south bank of Green River.
